BackgroundAnimation - Class in de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation
An abstract base class for all animations, which can be used to change backgrounds.
BackgroundAnimation(Context) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.BackgroundAnimation
Creates a new animation, which can be used to change drawables.
BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder<AnimationType extends BackgroundAnimation,BuilderType extends BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,?>> - Class in de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation
An abstract base class for all builders, which allow to create animations, which can be used to change backgrounds.
BOTTOM - Static variable in interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog.Gravity
The flag, which specifies, that the dialog should be located at the bottom.
Builder(Context) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.CircleRevealAnimation.Builder
Creates a new builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size as a clipping circle.
Builder(Context) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.CircleTransitionAnimation.Builder
Creates a new builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.

Defines the interface a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain up to three buttons, must implement.
